text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Elden Ring and Valorant. The build quality of the ASUS ROG Strix Scar II GL704GV-DS74 Gaming and Business Laptop (Intel i7-8750H 6-Core, 16GB RAM, 1TB HDD + 512GB PCIe SSD, 17.3" FHD IPS (1920x1080), GeForce RTX 2060, RGB KB, Win 10 Home) VR Ready is solid, and the speakers is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Call of Duty: Warzone and Apex Legends. The build quality of the ASUS ROG Strix Scar II GL704GV-DS74 Gaming and Business Laptop (Intel i7-8750H 6-Core, 16GB RAM, 1TB HDD + 512GB PCIe SSD, 17.3" FHD IPS (1920x1080), GeForce RTX 2060, RGB KB, Win 10 Home) VR Ready is solid, and the speakers is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2060 in the ASUS ROG Strix Scar II GL704GV-DS74 Gaming and Business Laptop (Intel i7-8750H 6-Core, 16GB RAM, 1TB HDD + 512GB PCIe SSD, 17.3" FHD IPS (1920x1080), GeForce RTX 2060, RGB KB, Win 10 Home) VR Ready is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
